pedi.name: Basic Pedicure
pedi.desc: Treatment consists of a foot soak, nail clipping and shaping, cuticle work, pumice stone/file scrub, moisturizer, calf and foot massage, and polish.

pedi.name: Spa Pedicure
pedi.desc: A Basic Pedicure with the addition of a sugar scrub and warm towel wrap.

pedi.name: Peppermint Spa Pedicure
pedi.desc: A Spa Pedicure with a peppermint cream mask.

pedi.name: Paraffin Spa Pedicure
pedi.desc: A Spa Pedicure which also includes a paraffin wax treatment.

pedi.name: Deluxe Spa Pedicure
pedi.desc: A Paraffin Spa Pedicure which also includes a cream mask.

pedi.name: Hot Stone Pedicure
pedi.desc: A Spa Pedicure which also includes a hot stone massage.

pedi.name: Deluxe Hot Stone Pedicure
pedi.desc: In addition to a Hot Stone Pedicure, you will also receive a pariffin wax, cream mask, moisturizer, and a sugar scrub. These four additions will be a scent of your choice.
